text: Yā pana bhikkhunī akālacīvaraṃ kālacīvara nti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhājāpeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī akālacīvaraṃ kālacīvara nti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhājāpeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 2. Should any bhikkhunī, having determined an out-of-season cloth to be an in-season cloth, distribute it, it is to be forfeited and confessed.
